Title: The Tuskegee Airmen
Writer: Paris Qualles, Trey Ellis, Ron Hutchinson
Actors: Laurence Fishburne, Allen Payne, Malcolm-Jamal Warner
Plot: The true story of how a group of African American pilots overcame racist opposition to become one of the finest US fighter groups in World War II
Awards: Won 3 Primetime Emmys. 6 wins & 16 nominations total
